About Us

Overdrive Addendum was created as a group project for Simmons LIS-467, Web Development and Information Architecture, in the Spring of 2020.

Danielle is the User Experience Designer of Overdrive Addendum. Danielleâ€™s main focus is running usability tests to complete necessary changes and provide a user friendly website for library users. Danielle is a graduate student at Simmons University in Boston, MA.

Samantha is the Web Designer of Overdrive Addendum. As a designer Samantha provides cotent to the Overdrive Addendum team for the mood and style of the web pages. She also creates and alters graphic content for items like the logo and imagery for visual instructions. She is a graduate student at Simmons University in Boston, MA.

Vicki is the Web Developer of Overdrive Addendum. As a developer, Vicki's job is to make the site work. She also takes specifications for look from the team and implements everything. Vicki is a full time software engineer at the New York Times, and a graduate student at Simmons University in Boston, MA.
